mapper.select: SELECT SM1.MENU_CD AS MENU_CD, SM1.MENU_URL, SM2.MENU_NM AS HIR_MENU_NM, SM1.MENU_NM AS MENU_NM, SM1.MENU_ORD, SM1.MENU_DESC, SM1.MENU_PRT_YN, SM1.USE_YN, #{athCd} AS ATH_CD FROM SY_MENU SM1, SY_MENU SM2 WHERE SM1.HIR_MENU_CD = SM2.MENU_CD AND SM2.HIR_MENU_CD != 'MOO1' AND SM1.MENU_CD NOT IN (SELECT SM.MENU_CD FROM SY_ATH_GP SAG, SY_MENU SM WHERE SAG.MENU_CD = SM.MENU_CD AND SAG.PLNT_CD = #{plntCd} AND ATH_CD = #{athCd}) ORDER BY SM1.MENU_CD

SELECT SM1.MENU_CD AS MENU_CD, SM1.MENU_URL, SM2.MENU_NM AS HIR_MENU_NM, SM1.MENU_NM AS MENU_NM, SM1.MENU_ORD, SM1.MENU_DESC, SM1.MENU_PRT_YN, SM1.USE_YN, #{athCd} AS ATH_CD FROM SY_MENU SM1, SY_MENU SM2 WHERE SM1.HIR_MENU_CD = SM2.MENU_CD AND SM2.HIR_MENU_CD != 'MOO1' AND SM1.MENU_CD IN (SELECT SM.MENU_CD FROM SY_ATH_GP SAG, SY_MENU SM WHERE SAG.MENU_CD = SM.MENU_CD AND SAG.PLNT_CD = #{plntCd} AND ATH_CD = #{athCd}) ORDER BY SM1.MENU_CD
